author: rocknet
content: Hi there.  I've seen several Holesky deprecation timelines ('two weeks post-Fusaka fork', 'October 17', 'by the end of the month').  Two weeks post-Fusaka implies morning of 15 October, right?  Wondering if we'll get more specific, or just assume people will turn off their nodes starting Wednesday and when it dies, it dies?

author: parithosh
content:
Yeah i think we should have clarified a bit better, two weeks after BPO2 would be ideal. But as long as the bpo2 is done and successful then it doesnt strictly matter if the network is around or not.

If thereâ€™s big validators turning off, let us know beforehand!

author: rocknet
content: I'm a genesis validator, and coordinating the rest of Rocket Pool genesis validators.  Just want to put out the best info to that group.
